name: WhatsMyName
body:
### Welcome to WhatsMyName iOS App official support page
WhatsMyName is an easy-to-use app exclusive to iOS.  WhatsMyName makes it easy to generate custom name-tag wallet / passbook entries for your favourite coffee loyalty card.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with WhatsMyName? Discovered a bug?   Don't hesitate to [Contact Us](mailto:derekgourlay+whatsmyname@gmail.com?Subject=WhatsMyName%20User%20Feedback&Body=Hey%20Derek%21%0A%0AI%27d%20like%20to%20give%20you%20some%20feedback%20about%20WhatsMyName...) and we'll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
